docs.text: you've got mail is a timely romance for this impersonal , computer-driven decade .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: two people who've never met confide in each other via e-mail without revealing their true identities .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: nora ephron's contemporary update of the shop around the corner retains the basic plot : two people who despise each other unwittingly become enamored with each other through their anonymous correspondence .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ephron , who co-wrote the film with her sister , delia , as well as directed it , knew what she was doing by reteaming tom hanks and meg ryan as the at-odds couple .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ryan is kathleen kelly , owner of a small children's bookstore , while hanks is joe fox , who heads up a chain of mega bookstores ( think barnes & noble ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: their charm and chemistry are the glue that binds this film , even through some of the script's rough spots .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: for the ephrons invested so much effort in their protagonists that they give short shrift to the talented supporting cast , including parker posey , greg kinnear , jean stapleton and steve zahn .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: yet no one is really going to complain because the ephrons know their audience - and what the paying public wants is hanks and ryan .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and the two are kept busy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: one , the other or both are in nearly every scene .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: hanks has his decent guy routine down pat , yet each time he does it , it seems effortless , spontaneous and fresh .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ryan smoothly moves between spunky and vulnerable , with a sexy touch of winsomeness added to the brew .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: their scenes together sparkle , even though they lack the nostalgic romanticism of sleepless in seattle .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and the shadow of that earlier hit hangs over you've got mail like dried-up mistletoe .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the sparks created by the earlier movie are , by necessity , not evident here .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: true , these are two people seeking true love , but you've got mail is more comic and less poignant than its predecessor .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the ephrons' script is witty and sharp .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , as a director nora ephron is a bit uneven .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: some scenes drag , while others , especially when hanks and ryan are revealing their souls via e-mail , are crisp and tidy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: also , the script gets sloppy toward the end with characters merely disappearing from the story .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a nice , romantic soundtrack adds to this date-night special .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: overall , you've got mail is a lush and cute outing , taking advantage of the star appeal of its two leads .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's a nice holiday movie , one for holding hands and snuggling .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: committed to lifelong learning through effective communication
